section.section: If a civil action is not elected under § 20-1007 of this subtitle, the case shall be heard by an administrative law judge.
The hearing shall be held in the county where the alleged discriminatory act occurred.

text.section: The general counsel of the Commission shall present the case in support of the complaint at the hearing.

section.section: Testimony taken at the hearing shall be under oath and recorded.
A transcript shall be made of all testimony at the hearing.

text.section: The administrative law judge may allow any complaint or answer to be reasonably amended.
